channel.title: Autospawn.cfg
channel.description: can anyone give me an autospawn template? im coding from blank source and client...

item.title: Autospawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

PostForMyRep:

can anyone give me an autospawn template? im coding from blank source and client…

If you’re programming this from a blank source then you won’t have any way of reading the file anyways.

Some important things to include when reading the file. The NPC Id, xCoord, yCoord, height. You can program a method to handle randomization when walking and their attack/defence should be handled differently then through a .cfg file imo.

Then you’ll have to set-up your new file

	class NPCDrop {
		public int npcId;
		public int xCoord;
		public int yCoord;
		public int height;
		
		public NPCDrop(int npcId, int xCoord, int yCoord, int height) {
			this.npcId = npcId;
			this.xCoord = xCoord;
			this.yCoord = yCoord;
			this.height = height;
		}
	}

Implement it wherever needbe, not sure what source you’re using so I can’t help much further than that.

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @nikolaww3 nikolaww3
item.description:
@nikolaww3 wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:2, topic:438909”]//spawn spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description //spawn = 3381 3091 3488 0 0 0 0 0 1 pets //spawn = 6750 2038 4540 0 0 0 0 0 1 //spawn = 5839 3076 3510 0 0 0 0 0 1 //spawn = 1294 3076 3511 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1158 3482 9484 0 0 55 600 380 250 Kalphite Queen spawn = 5030 2900 3540 0 0 0 0 0 1 captain cain spawn = 2830 2901 3539 0 0 0 0 0 1 CAPTAIN DONNIE! spawn = 8596 2910 3612 12 1 95 1050 1150 Avatar spawn = 1778 2510 4724 0 1 0 0 0 1 spawn = 554 2834 2984 0 0 0 0 0 1 fancy spawn = 1779 2512 4716 0 1 0 0 0 1 spawn = 520 2902 3530 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 6055 2162 5093 0 1 0 0 0 1 spawn = 6055 2160 5095 0 1 0 0 0 1 [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] [/quote]
thats really messy
here // npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description spawn = 2745 2401 5093 0 0 0 0 0 Jad spawn = 2881 2907 4445 0 1 38 500 200 Supreme spawn = 2882 2915 4456 0 1 67 500 200 Prime spawn = 2883 2922 4444 0 1 36 500 100 Rex spawn = 3200 3275 3914 0 1 40 450 550 Chaos Ele //spawn = 50 3218 3431 0 1 40 300 250 KBD spawn = 50 2271 4698 0 1 25 500 350 King Black Dragon [ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
